 these two macros should be used to make it clear what is happening /// when probeids are mapped between the internal an /// external worlds. should also note that "_id" is evaled /// more than once. (so dont use an expression.)

Define Documentation

#define TO_ZEROBASED (   _id  )     ((0<=_id)?_id-1:_id)

these two macros should be used to make it clear what is happening /// when probeids are mapped between the internal an /// external worlds. should also note that "_id" is evaled /// more than once. (so dont use an expression.)

"0" is bad, map it to "-1", leave "<0" unchanged, subtract 1 from the rest.
